context: F5 Networks was in its early stages, focusing on application delivery and load balancing solutions. The market was emerging from basic load balancing systems developed in the late 1990s to ensure website availability and scalability. Competition was primarily from networking equipment vendors.

competitors.name: Cisco Systems
competitors.notes: Major networking vendor with load balancing products including CSS (Content Services Switch)

competitors.name: Foundry Networks
competitors.notes: Provider of high-performance network switching and load balancing solutions (later acquired by Brocade)

competitors.name: Radware
competitors.notes: Early competitor in application delivery and load balancing

competitors.name: Alteon (Nortel)
competitors.notes: Load balancing and application switching solutions

competitors.name: Resonate
competitors.notes: Early application delivery and global load balancing vendor
